text: Just Tell Me What You Want is a 1980 American romantic comedy movie directed by Sidney Lumet and starring Ali MacGraw, Myrna Loy, Judy Kaye, Alan King, Keenan Wynn, Joseph Maher, Peter Weller. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet
title: Just Tell Me What You Want
